parse_markers.error: No page-level DocBlock was found in file Peyote/Select.php

docblock.description: Building a SELECT query.
docblock.long-description: The join(), select(), and limit() functions should just be passthrus, but I was getting an error when naming a function the same as the class (php4 FTW!) so I had to just move the methods here and call back. Lame I know, but the only other choice was to go back down to 5.2 and name everything with underscores, and I didn't want to do that, so here we are...

tag.description: A list of traits that the query can passthru

tag.description: A list of columns to search for
